events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer role from the candidate John Doe on March 1st.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for a software development position.
Recruiter Emily Smith has been assigned to handle John Doe's application for the engineering position.
The candidate underwent an initial screening call where basic software engineering skills and experience were assessed.
John Doe responded positively to the initial screening and expressed enthusiasm for moving forward in the hiring process.
A technical interview has been scheduled with John Doe for March 10th, focusing on software development and problem-solving skills.
John Doe completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong proficiency in coding and system design.
The HR interview has been scheduled for John Doe on March 15th to discuss company culture and benefits.
John Doe completed the HR interview and showed alignment with company values and team collaboration expectations.
An offer for the Software Engineer position has been prepared and sent to John Doe including salary details and benefits.
John Doe provided positive feedback on the offer and asked for a few days to consider the terms carefully.
John Doe accepted the offer for the Software Engineer role enthusiastically and confirmed his start date as April 1st.
John Doe started the onboarding process on April 1st, completing necessary documentation and initial training sessions.
The hiring process for John Doe has been successfully closed with all onboarding formalities completed and integration into the engineering team.
